title: RaiseEventAlarmInstanceByName (Method)
text:
METHOD RaiseEventAlarmInstanceByName : BOOL
Raises an Event for a specified alarm template instance.
If a function block is used in several alarm group templates this function can be used to obtain the correct alarm instance.
This method uses semaphore synchronization with AlarmEvaluation_PRG.

rows.Name: pFBInstance
rows.Comment:
Pointer to the template FB instance. Use THIS when inside
the function block.

rows:
The Alarm ID within the related alarm group template, which should be raised. The name of the generated
enum has to be passed: Alm_<Name of the alarm template group>_Alarm_IDs

Name of the related alarm group template of this template instance.
In case of multiple alarm group template objects that use the same FB as type, specify the specific type.
